summary: This bill, the Bipartisan Bulletproof Vest Partnership Program Expansion Act, aims to increase the federal share of the Patrick Leahy Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program. It amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to increase the federal contribution to 60% and authorizes $60,000,000 in appropriations for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2030 to support the program.
